mapper.update: UPDATE boards SET view_count = view_count + 1 WHERE id = #{id};
mapper.select: SELECT b.id AS boardId, b.title, b.content, b.view_count AS viewCount, DATE_FORMAT(b.created_at, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS createdAt, b.created_by AS createdBy, DATE_FORMAT(b.updated_at, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS updatedAt, c.name AS categoryName, bi.id AS boardImageId, bi.stored_name AS storedName, bi.stored_path AS storedPath, bi.extension, a.id AS attachmentId, a.logical_name AS logicalName, a.stored_name AS storedName, a.stored_path AS storedPath, a.extension, a.size, cm.id AS commentId, cm.content, DATE_FORMAT(cm.created_at, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS createdAt, cm.created_by AS createdBy FROM boards b LEFT JOIN categories c on c.id = b.category_id LEFT JOIN attachments a on b.id = a.board_id LEFT JOIN board_images bi on b.id = bi.board_id LEFT JOIN comments cm on b.id = cm.board_id where b.id = 1;
